T02D2335:299a-16: 'ga' zhig bdud rtsi zhes bya ba'i //
T02D2335:299a-17: gtam nyid kyis ni tshim mod kyang //
T02D2335:299a-18: mngon sum nyams myong bdag nyid ni //
T02D2335:299a-19: ro la brtson pa'i rnam smin no //
T02D2335:299a-20: su zhig gzugs kyi tshogs bsdu ba //
T02D2335:299a-21: dmigs dang bcas la chags med dang //
T02D2335:299a-22: dmigs pa med par rtse gcig pa'i //
T02D2335:299a-23: mchog de rnams ni dkon pa nyid //
T02D2335:299a-24: 'ga' zhig stong pa nyid la ngang //
T02D2335:299a-25: la la sbyor ba'i rim par rmongs //
T02D2335:299a-26: su zhig bde ba che spro ba'i //
T02D2335:299a-29: go bar byed pa'i snying po rab tu dad pas gsal byas las //
T02D2335:299a-30: bsod nams phung po dri ma med pa bdag gis gang thob pa //
T02D2335:299a-31: des ni 'jig rten rnam par rtog pa'i dra ba yongs bsal nas //
T02D2335:299a-32: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tshogs mchog snying po go bar
T02D2335:299a-33: byed gyur cig / dpe la shin tu rmongs pa
T02D2335:299a-34: ro gcig gyur pa'i yid can rnams kyi dper bya
T02D2335:299a-35: rab gsal pa // gsal bar rig pa bla ma'i
T02D2335:299a-36: bla mar gyur la gal te shes rab rang bzhin
T02D2335:299a-37: rab gsal pa // can yin kyang // gzhan las
T02D2335:299a-38: rtogs pa'i 'bras min rdo rje can gyi bka' lung
T02D2335:299a-39: thob pa rgyud dang rjes mthu pa //
T02D2335:299a-40: de rig pa la go byed snying po brgya par dpal ldan he ru ka yis brjod pa yin //
T02D2335:299a-41: dngos po'i yid kyi rol pa mang po'i tshogs kyis phal cher brtse ba'i ro yis ni //
T02D2335:299a-42: bsnyems pa'i brtsams pas rnam par bsgyings pa'i gus pas 'jug pa ci yang rung ba smros //
T02D2335:299b-0: rnam pa thams cad don ni ji lta'i @299b nyams kyis kun du rtog pas gzung ba las //
T02D2335:299b-1: bdag la ches sngar dang ces smra bar bya ba'am ji ltar bya ba de bzhin gyis //
T02D2335:299b-2: gang zhig nad pa shin tu skom pa'i gdung ba yis kyang chu //
T02D2335:299b-3: mthong nas dang bas der ni bsnyen kyang rnam par dpyod pa yis //
T02D2335:299b-4: rmongs pas 'dir ni 'thung dang bsten par yang ni mi byed pa //
T02D2335:299b-5: de la bde ba gcig kyang ga la skom pa nyid ces bya //
T02D2335:299b-6: go bar byed pa'i snying po brgya pa rnam par
T02D2335:299b-7: bshad pa zhes bya ba dpal he ru ka de
T02D2335:299b-8: ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad ba rdzogs so /
T02D2335:299b-10: // / rgya gar shar phyogs sang+na ga ra'i pandi ta chen po shr'i ba na ratna'i zhal sngar //
T02D2335:299b-11: dge slong chos smra ba bsod nams rgya mtsho'i sde
T02D2335:299b-12: zhes bya bas dpal ngam ring gi yang rtser mnyan
